description.ko: FLORA-9은 유기적 생명체와 수정체 데이터 구조가 공생하는 빛나는 정원 속에서 공존하는 미래를 구상하는 '디지털 네이처'의 개념적 탐구입니다.
description.en: FLORA-9 is a conceptual exploration of 'Digital Nature,' envisioning a future where organic life and crystalline data structures coexist in a symbiotic luminous garden.

prompt: A hyper-realistic cinematic shot of FLORA-9, a futuristic digital ecosystem where bioluminescent flora is integrated with fiber-optic networks. Glowing translucent leaves with data-stream veins, iridescent petals pulsing with neon light, holographic pollen floating in the air, high-tech cybernetic garden, 8k resolution, octane render, ethereal atmosphere.
